question: In the context of measures taken to combat Covid-19, what is ‘CoNTeC’, that was making news recently?
explanation:
The Union Minister of Health & Family Welfare Harsh Vardhan recently launched the ‘National Teleconsultation Centre (CoNTeC)’.
CoNTeC is a Tele-medicine Hub, which has been implemented by the All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS), New Delhi. Expert doctors from various domains will be available to resolve and answer the questions from all over the country.
